title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions:
Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker – Black

Overview:
Experience deep, clear, and immersive audio anywhere you go with the Bose SoundLink Flex. This rugged, portable Bluetooth speaker pairs premium sound with all-weather durability, smart features, and an all-day battery—perfect for travel, outdoor adventures, and poolside sessions.

Key Features:
- Signature Bose sound: Custom-engineered transducer delivers rich bass, crisp highs, and balanced mids for room-filling audio.
- PositionIQ technology: Automatically optimizes sound whether the speaker is upright, hanging, or lying flat.
- Rugged and adventure-ready: IP67 waterproof and dustproof, floats on water, and is drop, corrosion, and UV light resistant.
- All-day battery: Up to 12 hours of playtime on a rechargeable lithium‑ion battery; fully charges in approximately 4 hours via USB‑C.
- Built-in mic: Take calls clearly and access Siri or Google Assistant hands-free.
- Seamless connectivity: Reliable Bluetooth with up to 30 ft (9 m) wireless range.
- Bose Connect app: Personalize settings, access software updates, and manage pairings with ease.
- Portable design: Compact, easy to hold and store, with a secure utility loop for attaching to bags or hooks.

Specifications:
- Type: Portable speaker with microphone
- Color: Black
- Waterproof Rating: IP67 (waterproof and dustproof); floats
- Durability: Drop tested; dust, corrosion, and UV light resistant
- Battery: Lithium‑ion; up to 12 hours per charge; USB‑C charging; ~4 hours to full
- Wireless Range: Up to 30 feet
- Smart Features: Siri and Google Assistant access; Bose Connect app support

What’s in the box:
- Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker (Black)
- USB‑C charging cable
- Quick start guide

Ideal For:
- Travel, hiking, beach and pool days, backyard gatherings, and everyday listening where durability and premium sound matter.

Bring big Bose sound wherever life takes you with the SoundLink Flex—built to perform, designed to go anywhere.
